name: rejected_basic
body_text: Unfortunately, we have decided to progress with other candidates.

name: rejected_shortlisted
body_text: Thank you for your application. You were not shortlisted.

name: interview_request_availability
body_text: We would like to discuss your application. When are you free for a phone screen?

name: interview_request_schedule
body_text: Can we arrange a time to meet and discuss the role?

name: viewed_signal
body_text: Your application was viewed on SEEK.

name: ack_received
body_text: Thank you for applying. We have received your application.

name: other_noise
body_text: Here is your subscription receipt. No action required.

name: priority_conflict
body_text: Thank you for applying. We have received your application. We would like to arrange a time to discuss next steps.
